item.title: Electronic Arts cancels Black Panther game, closes Cliffhanger Games
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/electronic-arts-cancels-black-panther-game-closes-cliffhanger-games

Company to focus on a small handful of franchises going forward.

Electronic Arts has canceled its third-person single-player game based on Marvel’s Black Panther franchise and will shut down developer Cliffhanger Games, according to an IGN report.

“These decisions are hard,” said Electronic Arts Entertainment president Laura Miele in an email sent to staff. “They affect people we’ve worked with, learned from, and shared real moments with. We’re doing everything we can to support them—including finding opportunities within [Electronic Arts], where we’ve had success helping people land in new roles.”

Electronic Arts is also laying off staff on both its mobile and central teams, but the company declined to comment on the number of employees affected.

According to Miele, these changes are being done to “sharpen [Electronic Arts’] focus and put our creative energy behind the most significant growth opportunities.” Going forward, Miele said, Electronic Arts intends to focus on a small handful of franchises, including Apex Legends, Battlefield, The Sims, and skate. She also assured that the company is continuing production on its Iron Man game in at Motive, the third entry in the Star Wars: Jedi series at Respawn Entertainment, and the next Mass Effect game at BioWare.

item.title: ‘Deadly bouncing ball’ first-person shooter Sydless announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/deadly-bouncing-ball-first-person-shooter-sydless-announced-for-pc

French developer Opia Gmaes has announced Sydless, a fast-paced first-person shooter where your only weapon is a deadly bouncing ball. It will launch for PC via Steam in 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

Sydless is a fast-paced first-person shooter built around momentum, skill, and a deadly bouncing ball, the more you punch it, the faster it gets—turning it into a high-speed, projectile of destruction. It fuses together classic movement shooters with a unique bouncing ball weapon.

Reality is breaking. Trapped in an anomaly, you are Diego, an employee of Rundy’s Burger, a fast-food chain at the end of the ‘90s. But something is wrong. The restaurant keeps shifting, twisting into increasingly distorted versions of itself.

Use your agility and mastery of movement to navigate the chaos and avoid relentless attacks from the customers, twisted by the shifting reality of the restaurant. Destroy them with your only weapon—a high-speed bouncing ball that gains more power the faster it moves. Punch it, control it and Turn every room into a deadly playground.

Progress through four chapters, each unlocking new powers to push your abilities even further. Every level features a ranking system based on speed and skill.

Master each stage, and push your skills to the limit as you fight to escape the loop… if escape is even possible.
